description.value: After making a Roll on the 'Eadbang Table, the Character can spend a Fate Point to immediately kill a single Gretchin, Squig, or Snotling that they have gained via the Runtz Talent. In doing so, they do not suffer the rolled result of the 'Eadbang Table. The creature detonates in a shower of gore and green sparks.

system.benefit: After making a Roll on the 'Eadbang Table, the Character can spend a Fate Point to immediately kill a single Gretchin, Squig, or Snotling that they have gained via the Runtz Talent. In doing so, they do not suffer the rolled result of the 'Eadbang Table. The creature detonates in a shower of gore and green sparks.

prerequisites.text: Ork Weirdboy, Da Power of Waaagh!, Runtz

specialAbilities.name: Last-Minute Escape
specialAbilities.description: Once per session when reduced to 0 Wounds, you may immediately move your full movement and take cover without provoking attacks.
